org.apache.avalon.logging.logkit
Class LogKitLogger

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.avalon.logging.logkit.LogKitLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public final class LogKitLogger
extends Object
implements Logger

The default LogKit wrapper class for Logger.

Version:
CVS $Revision: 1.1.1.8 $ $Date: 2004/04/04 13:30:17 $
Author:
Avalon Development Team

getChildLogger

public final Logger getChildLogger(String name)
Create a new child logger. The name of the child logger is [current-loggers-name].[passed-in-name] Throws IllegalArgumentException if name has an empty element name

Specified by:
getChildLogger in interface Logger
Parameters:
name - the subname of this logger
Returns:
the new logger
